subject: Re: Thank you for your recent debt request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$446,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this simplified form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://hodestone.com/
